pullrequest.title: Implement an option to respect enviroment flags

content.raw: I think that this line should be removed.  Otherwise, there's no way for the user/packager to specify a value for `CMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE`.  As a consequence, if `USE_UPSTREAM_CFLAGS` is `False` and `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE` is `Release`, then we'll always get CMake's default release flags (usually `-s -O3 -NDEBUG`).
